languages.text: {n}Холодный и проницательный взгляд Хейнрикса не выдает каких-либо эмоций — дознаватель лишь натянуто улыбается в ответ.{/n} "В таком случае надеюсь, что их хватит на то, чтобы доставить меня до Футфола".

traits.locale_text: {n}Холодный и проницательный взгляд Хейнрикса не выдает каких-либо эмоций — дознаватель лишь натянуто улыбается в ответ.{/n} "В таком случае надеюсь, что их хватит на то, чтобы доставить меня до Футфола".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."
languages.original_text: {n}Холодный и проницательный взгляд Хейнрикса не выдает каких-либо эмоций — дознаватель лишь натянуто улыбается в ответ.{/n} "В таком случае надеюсь, что их хватит на то, чтобы доставить меня до Футфола".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In this case I hope they last just long enough to take me to Footfall."
{n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In this case I hope they last just long enough to take me to Footfall."
{n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In this case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."
{n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In this case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."
{n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."
{n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

languages.text: {n}À l'instar de son sourire figé, le regard glacial et perçant d'Heinrix ne trahit aucune émotion.{/n} « Dans ce cas, j'espère qu'il vous en restera suffisamment, le temps que j'arrive à Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'instar de son sourire figé, le regard glacial et perçant d'Heinrix ne trahit aucune émotion.{/n} « Dans ce cas, j'espère qu'il vous en restera suffisamment, le temps que j'arrive à Castel. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希冰冷的锐利目光没有透露出任何情绪，干巴巴的微笑不带任何感情。{/n}“既然如此，我希望你的仁慈与耐心能坚持到我抵达落脚港。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希冰冷的锐利目光没有透露出任何情绪，干巴巴的微笑不带任何感情。{/n}“既然如此，我希望你的仁慈与耐心能坚持到我抵达落脚港。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' kalter und durchbohrender Blick verrät keinerlei Emotionen, und auch sein trockenes Lächeln nicht.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, hoffe ich, dass sie lange genug aushalten, um mich nach Footfall zu bringen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' kalter und durchbohrender Blick verrät keinerlei Emotionen, und auch sein trockenes Lächeln nicht.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, hoffe ich, dass sie lange genug aushalten, um mich nach Footfall zu bringen."

languages.text: {n}La mirada fría y penetrante de Heinrix no muestra signos de emoción alguna, al igual que su impasible sonrisa.{/n} «En ese caso, espero que le duren lo suficiente hasta que llegue a Paso».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada fría y penetrante de Heinrix no muestra signos de emoción alguna, al igual que su impasible sonrisa.{/n} «En ese caso, espero que le duren lo suficiente hasta que llegue a Paso».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの冷たく突き刺すような視線にも、乾いた笑いにも、感情はひとつもこもっていない。{/n}「それなら、俺がフットフォールに到着するまで耐えてくれることを願うよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの冷たく突き刺すような視線にも、乾いた笑いにも、感情はひとつもこもっていない。{/n}「それなら、俺がフットフォールに到着するまで耐えてくれることを願うよ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in soğuk ve delici bakışları herhangi bir duygu ifşa etmiyor. Kuru gülümsemesi de öyle.{/n} "Bu durumda umarım Binliman'a gelmeden önce o sınıra ulaşmazlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's cold and piercing gaze does not betray any emotion, and neither does his dry smile.{/n} "In that case, I hope they last long enough to get me to Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in soğuk ve delici bakışları herhangi bir duygu ifşa etmiyor. Gülümsemesi de öyle.{/n} "Bu durumda umarım Binliman'a gelmeden önce o sınıra ulaşmazlar."
